required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ibuprofen (MOMENT ACT ANALGESIC Granules) Pharmacokinetic Study
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of a Single Oral Administration of MOMENT ACT ANALGESIC Granules for Oral Solution to Healthy Volunteers Under Fasting Conditions Single Centre, Single Dose, Open-label, Bioavailability Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Aziende Chimiche Riunite Angelini Francesco S.p.A

clinical_study.source: Aziende Chimiche Riunite Angelini Francesco S.p.A

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study was to evaluate the pharmacokinetic (PK) profile of ibuprofen after oral administration of a single dose of MOMENT ACT ANALGESIC granules to healthy male and female subjects, under fasting conditions.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of ibuprofen
Apparent terminal elimination rate constant (Î»z) of ibuprofen
Apparent terminal elimination half-life (t1/2,z) of ibuprofen
Lag-time from the dosing time point prior to the first measurable plasma concentration (tlag) of ibuprofen
Time to the first ibuprofen plasma concentration of 5 ug/mL (ton5)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to the first ibuprofen plasma concentration of 10 ug/mL (ton10)

arm_group.description: ibuprofen 400 mg granules, oral solution, single administration under fasting conditions

intervention.description: ibuprofen 400 mg single dose oral solution

facility.name: CROSS Research S.A., Phase I Unit, Via F.A. Giorgioli 14 Phone: Fax: +41.91.63.00.511 Email:
